course_title: Advanced Topics in Biology - ADV TOPICS BIOL

201.comments: TITLE: Metabolic rate and measurementDESCRIPTION: This module will focus on understanding and applying techniques for measuring metabolic rate, across both invertebrates and vertebrates. It will give a background to the methods used, the equipment required, and the strengths and limitations afforded by different experimental approaches.Instructor: Phil MatthewsLocation: BioSci 4225
